achievements: Development and maintenance of backend endpoints using Django and Python
Improvement and optimization of the frontend implemented in Vue.js
Optimization of the Azure cloud server, achieving a 75% reduction in response times
Implementation of internationalization for Spanish and Portuguese in the frontend
Development and maintenance of technical documentation for the project
Integration of Large Language Models (LLM) to improve user experience
Successful styling and animation of landing pages
Establishment of code standards and best practices in the frontend team
Implementation of new features in React.js, improving user experience
Application performance optimization, reducing loading times by 40%
Requirements gathering with healthcare system stakeholders
Design and documentation of robust RESTful APIs
Integration of internal systems with external platforms like EPS and RIPS portals
Code refactoring to improve maintainability and performance
Implementation of unit, integration, and end-to-end tests
Configuration of development and production environments using Docker and Kubernetes
Implementation of CI/CD pipelines for efficient and secure deployments
